A coat rack made entirely out of recycled materials such as old bicycle wheels or shipping pallets.
A coat rack that doubles as a piece of art. The design could incorporate elements such as metalwork, woodcarving, or even glass blowing to create a truly one-of-a-kind piece.
A coat rack that is designed to be portable and easy to move from room to room. It could be made with lightweight materials such as aluminum or plastic and come in a variety of shapes and sizes.
A coat rack that incorporates a built-in charging station for electronic devices such as smartphones and tablets.

A coat rack that is designed to be functional as well as decorative. It could incorporate features such as hooks, shelves, and drawers to provide additional storage options for hats, scarves, and other accessories.
